channel.title: JetDirect on Wimpy's World
channel.description: Recent content in JetDirect on Wimpy's World

item.title: Creating a JetDirect Server with Linux
item.author: martin@wimpress.com (Martin Wimpress)
item.description: I created JetDirect compatible server on my NSLU2 running Ubuntu Jaunty 9.04 using p910nd, which is a small printer daemon that does not spool to disk but passes the job directly to the printer. It is particularly useful for disk less Linux workstations and embedded devices that have a printer hanging off them.
item.summary: Using the NSLU2 as a JetDirect print server
